item.description:
Looking for a new way to entertain at home?

Tired of the same old Wine & Cheese parties?

Don't even know how to go about pairing Wine and Cheese?

We have your cure!

Things To Do Boston and Les Zygomates will be hosting a “How to Host Your Own Wine Tasting” class on Thursday April 23th, 2009.

Ever since its’ inception in 1994, Les Zygomates has been committed to providing the Boston area with the best selection of wines by the glass from around the world. Sommelier Daniel Myers prides himself in making wine accessible to the general public, and his self-effacing, gregarious style makes learning about wine fun — the way it was meant to be.

Join us on the evening of Friday, March 20th as Daniel and Executive Chef John Paine elaborate on and demonstrate great ways to bring the experience home with you!


Suggested Attire: Business Casual

Directions: By T: Get off at South Station, walk across Atlantic Ave and go right onto Essex Street and left onto South Street.
item.name: How To Host Your Own Wine Tasting at Home
